      • getResolution

        public static int[] getResolution(javax.imageio.ImageReader r)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        The metadata of PNG and JPEG can contain the width of a pixel in millimeters. Return the the "effective" dpi calculated as 25.4/HorizontalPixelSize and 25.4/VerticalPixelSize. Where 25.4 is the number of mm in inch.(${t_de70a4064c564e9687b68b2352d8b402})
        Returns:
        array of two elements: {horizontalDpi, verticalDpi}. {96, 96} is the default.(${t_86e9af4e4da34db2ae17d0a76297d190})
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(${t_3b0146392d814e178d31dac81ceefe48})

      • setPreferredSize

                                                  double scaleX,
                                                  double scaleY)
        Calculate and set the preferred size (anchor) for this picture.(${t_8a0fb1a8c25a47dfa6908450c9eb7f0e})
        Parameters:
        scaleX - the amount by which image width is multiplied relative to the original width.(${t_5be82b47bbd8451cb9c2d299e604a594})
        scaleY - the amount by which image height is multiplied relative to the original height.(${t_10752533a8114897ab83a872ac8bb0b0})
        Returns:
        the new Dimensions of the scaled picture in EMUs(${t_0433ca22f1314d62bb2d029011c81715})
